resources.string:
一Point description
 If one of lib64 or lib already exists
 No need to continue 
 Can return to the connection server 


This app is based on lan-play
 So you need root privileges
 Tap to grant root privileges and continue

This application is based on lan-play

 Source：https://github.com/spacemeowx2/switch-lan-play

 Thanks to Daxie for making such an excellent online plugin

 I do not provide any server

 If you have a problem? Visit the link below
 https://github.com/liuzhushaonian/LanPlayAndoird/blob/master/QUEST.md

This operation is used to delete the placed system Lib dependency

 If you want to uninstall this APP

 Then perform this operation

 It will not work after relying on deletion lan-play

 Of course you can reconfigure dependencies on the configuration page.
